info.title: Purchase Contracts
info.description:
This service is based on the OData protocol. It enables you to read, create, and update purchase contracts through an API call from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA. The service contains header, item, item conditions, account assignment, address, and partner nodes.

Note: Certain elements and entities can only be used if you activate the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM. For more information, see Business Documentation.

x-sap-shortText: Create and maintain purchase contracts using this inbound service

get.summary: Gets the header details of all the purchase contracts in the system
get.description: Gets the header details of all the purchase contracts in the system. This operation filters and sorts the returned data. Note that if there are many purchase contracts in the system, this operation might take a while.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

post.description: Creates a new purchase contract with one or more items. It validates the correctness of the payload. In case the validation fails, it returns the errors in the response.

parameters.description: Purchasing Contract Header

get.description: Gets the header details such as supplier, company code, currency, and so on of a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number provided.

get.summary: Gets the partner details of a purchase contract
get.description: Gets the partner details such as partner function, purchasing organization, and so on in a purchase contract, using the purchase contract number, item number, purchasing organization, plant, partner function, partner counter, and supplier sub range provided.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Gets the details of all the value-added service data for purchase contract items in the system
get.description: Gets the details of all the value-added service data for purchase contract items in the system. You can use this operation by activating ISR_RETAILSYSTEM business function. Note that if there are many purchase contract items in the system, this operation might take a while.

post.summary: Creates one or more value-added services for a specific purchase contract item
post.description: Creates value-added service data for a specific purchase contract item that you must specify in the payload.You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

parameters.name: ValAddedSrvcTransactionNumber
parameters.description: Transaction Number

parameters.name: ValAddedSrvcItemGroup
parameters.description: Item Group

parameters.name: ValAddedSrvcItemNumber
parameters.description: Item Number

parameters.name: ValueAddedServiceType
parameters.description: VAS Service Types

parameters.name: ValueAddedSubServiceType
parameters.description: VAS Sub Services

get.summary: Gets the details of all the value-added service data for a specific purchase contract item
get.description: Gets the details of all the value-added service data for a specific item in a purchase contract, such as Service Types, Sub Service types, and so on, using the purchase contract number, item number, item group, service type and sub service type.You can use this operation by activating ISR_RETAILSYSTEM business function.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates the data of a specific value-added service item using purchase contract number, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

delete.description: Deletes the data of a specific value-added service item using purchase contract number, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
